column3:
Your Streamflix subscription is renewing!

Our prices are going up again - it’s going to look like a <color=#800000>$25</color> daily fee on your end.

We really appreciate the support as we continue to deliver mediocre shows that get cancelled as a tax write-off.

Your Pixney Plus subscription is renewing.

Your tribute is due.
A new <color=#800000>$25</color> recurring payment has been added to your account.

Your Soundify Premium is renewing.

It's just the cost of 10 coffees!
What that means for you is that your daily fee is increasing to <color=#800000>$25</color>.

Music is food for the soul, so keep yourself fed!

Your Amazin Prime membership is renewing!

Just pay <color=#800000>$25</color> daily to maintain access to 2-day shipping on:

1. Trendy, Loose Fit, Heavyweight, Short-Sleeve, Pocket T-Shirt, Multicolour.

Hoolu is a real streaming service with a passionate and dedicated fanbase.

<color=#800000>$25</color> please.

Your KBO MAX subscription is renewing.

We’ve just been acquired by Streamflix, but will still be charging two separate subscriptions.
Your due payment is now <color=#800000>$25</color>, a low price to pay for our excellent prestige dramas about the upper class dealing with issues completely alien to you.

Your Pineapple Music subscription renews today.

Investing in vibes! Your new vibe?
 Being financially responsible with our new subscription rate of <color=#800000>$25</color>.

Your playlists are immaculate!

Your ViewTube Premium payment plan is changing.

Take all the productivity you gained from losing the ads, and reinvest it into us! We’re now charging <color=#800000>$25</color> per day.

Background play is enabled, to help you keep your eyes on what matters most.

Your PlaySphere Plus is renewing.

They say you can’t put a price on fun, but we have. It’s just <color=#800000>$25</color>, barely enough to turn your head at.

Keep up the great K/D ratio.

Your Ybox Game Pass is renewing!\n\nThe greatest deal in gaming just got a little better - we’re moving to a daily payment model instead of monthly. Just <color=#800000>$25</color> for full access to the greatest curated library in the industry, including smash hits like FISA Football 25, FISA Football 24, FISA Football 23, FISA Football 22, and FISA Football 21.

Your Chatter Nitro is renewing.

Inflation hits hard, but your custom server emojis hit harder! That’s why we’ve decided to increase our rate to <color=#800000>$25</color> daily.
Get hyped for more epic benefits and useful features!
